file_content.text: How could you not double the guard?
It was a groundquake. They happen every week!
You mercenaries have gotten soft, guarding a rich little planet all these years. The Regulators weren't worth buying off.
You're in command here? What's your name?
Who are you?
You...?
I am Enforcer Vorjok, loyal hand of the Archon and seventeenth of my family to possess the honor of service.
Where these imbeciles have failed to end you, I will succeed. Attack!
The Regulators are not unskilled, but they could never be equal to a Sith.
They were a small challenge.
No? Then it will be me who kills you. I was the eye of the Archon on Nar Shaddaa, and procured more than one lightsaber for his collection.
If the Regulators failed the Hutts, perhaps they'd find the Empire more motivating.
Maybe they should work for me.
I'm not afraid of Sith.
The lord of the council....
You can't secure a planet while fighting external enemies as well. It's not the Regulators' fault the Hutts overreached.
Not their fault they failed.
"Overreached"? This is the destiny of the Hutts. The great Hutt Empire will be restored!
Send the alarm and attack!
One bounty hunter against a whole mercenary company. You paid the wrong side.
You should've hired me.
Huh. You're good. Fancy hardware, too.
But you kill thugs, and I win wars. Before Makeb, my team took down a basilisk war droid with an M-7 rocket.
Don't compare service records! Kill the intruders and warn the Hutts!
Sorry. Another time.
Silence, all of you.
You're dead. [Attack]
Send the alarm! Tell the Hutts we're under attack!
We must warn the Hutts... we must.
You will do nothing.
Dark Lord.
Mighty Wrath.
Commander.
Hunter.
With your leave, we will hold position here. No one will pursue you. No one will close off your escape route.
Draw the line here. I will find the inner vault and the isotope-5.
Very well.
Your team looks hurt. How bad is it?
Do you have casualties?
All of them yet live. Your attention honors them.
You are barely more than an apprentice, desperate to show teeth. I am the Emperor's Wrath; you are worthless here.
You're nothing next to me.
I climbed my way from slavery to become a Darth of the Sith Empire. Your power, Lord Cytharat, is useless to me; do what you will.
You're nothing next to me.
Do what you like. Maybe the mercenaries will trip over your body.
You're just cannon fodder.
I will serve as best as I am able.
My lord! I'll start trying to access the security controls--maybe we can link them to the gravity hook.
Begin.
If we can bring Stronghold One under your control, perhaps it will be of use. We shall await your word.
Lord Cytharat. I enjoy watching you in your element; we should do this again.
[Flirt] Always the professional.
Say the word, and I will be at your side.
For the Hutt Empire!
Die for the Archon!
Blood for blood!
